II. Purpose of Addendum
To add Adoption Evaluation and Adoption Placement Services to the existing child
placing agency license.
III. Methodology
Over a three-month period, Vista Maria developed and revised numerous adoption
policies and procedures, and submitted them to this BCAL consultant for review. A
meeting was held at the agency on 3/22/2012 for a final review of the policies and
the newly hired adoption staff. Two contractual staff, a Social Services Supervisor
and Social Service Worker, will begin work in the new program. Additional staff will
be hired as needed.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Vista Maria is in compliance with all of the Child Placing Agency Rules regarding
Adoption Evaluation Services and Adoption Placement Services.
V. Recommendation
I recommend the Vista Maria Foster Care License be expanded to include Adoption
Services.
